Version 2.0.58 - On-the-fly Resume Correction

Bug Fix

  • Fixes resume still showing slide 13 instead of 16 after page refresh
  • Root cause: defineProperty trap fires before cmi data is populated, so pre-computed resume correction gets empty data and doesn't install interceptors

Changes

  • Read interceptors now compute corrections ON-THE-FLY when reads happen (data is available at that point), instead of pre-computing at trap time (when data may be empty)
  • Read interceptor installed whenever furthestSlide is known, not just when pre-computed correction succeeded
  • Write interceptor for suspend_data always active when furthestSlide is known (prevents ANY backwards regression in DB)
  • Scheduled post-init write always runs when furthestSlide is known
  • Time-based window (10s) for resume read intercepts to avoid interfering with natural navigation
  • All changes applied to both SCORM 1.2 and SCORM 2004

  • v2.0.57: Score write interception, persist furthest in Moodle DB
